text.en: Messenger of the word of the Lotus of Uḍḍiyāna,
Glorious supreme being (Chokgyur) who spontaneously fulfills the two goals,
text.en-trans: chokgyur dön nyi lhün gyi drubpé pal

text.en: With your realization of unchanging great bliss (Dechen),
You lead all beings to the island (Lingpa) of great liberation.
text.en-trans: tarpa chenpö ling du dro kün dren

text.en: You spread and expand the doctrine of the Three Jewels (Könchok Tenzin Dargyé).
text.en-trans: könchok tendzin dar zhing gyepé dé

text.en: To you, the Jewel Vidyādhara (Rikdzin Ratna), I pray!
text.en-trans: rigdzin ratné tsen der solwa deb

text.en: May I receive all the victor’s supreme teachings as the definitive meaning!
text.en-trans: sung rab tamché ngedön nyi du tob

text.en: May I reflect unhindered on the full range of karma, both virtuous and non-virtuous, on what to accept and reject.
May I train in the intent of the third and final turning of the wheel,
text.en-trans: khorlo sum gyi tamé gongdön gom

text.en: And may I capture the kingdom of the all-ground, the bliss-gone essence.
In short, grant your blessings that I may realize correctly
The practice tradition of the great Drikung Protector!
